13975.「……私の夫は アルノーが生まれる前に\n 神の御手として 散った。:
...My husband was scattered as the hand of God
before Arnoud was born.

13976.「夫の遺志を継ぎ 多くのことを学んできた。\n おこがましくも 自分に救えぬ者な:
I have learned a lot from my husband's legacy.
I was afraid that there was no one that I
could not save.

13977.「だが どうだ……。\n 私は 我が子すら 助けてやれない。: But you see I can't even help my own child.

13978.「……<pc> 覚えていますか？\n 洗礼の儀の時 エルドナ神は 災いを予見し\:
...<pc> Do you remember? At the time
of your baptism, God Eldona's Baptism, he
foresaw the disaster and needed you.

13979.「いったい あれは なんだったのでしょう。: What on earth was that all about?

13980.<pc>は\n木彫りのエルドナ神像に 手を伸ばした……。:
<pc> reached for a Wood Carved Idol
of Eldona...

13983.「まさかと思って 後をつけてきたが……\n 本当に ここに来るとはな。:
I followed you because I didn't think you'd be
here, but I didn't think you'd actually be
here.

13985.「その神像は 我らキリカ修道会の僧侶にとって\n エルドナ神そのものだ。たとえ:
The Idol is, to us Kirika monks, the very
essence of Eldona. No matter what, we would
never lay a hand on his body.

13986.「さあ その神像を 台座の上に戻すのだ。 <yesno><close>: Now put that Idol back on its pedestal.<yesno><close>

13987.「……それでいい。\n 私は お前のしたことを見なかった。:
That's... that's fine. I didn't see what you
did.

13990.「ならば 好きにするがいい。\n 私には…… お前を止めることが できない。: Then do what you want. I... can't stop you.

13991.<pc>は\n木彫りの神像（だいじなもの）を 手に入れた！<me 60>:
<pc> received
the Wood Carved Idol (Key Item)!<me 60>

13992.「なんと！ その木彫りの像は……\n キリカ修道会の ご神像じゃないですか！:
What a surprise! That Wood Carved Idol is the
Idol of the Order of Kirika!

13993.「まさか <pc>さん！\n その 閃香樹でできた ご神像を焚いて\n みんなを:
No way. Are you going to save everyone by
burning that Idol made of sparkling wood?<yesno><close>

13994.「ウソを つかないでください。\n こんな所に ご神像を 持ってくる理由なんて\:
Please don't lie to me. Why else would you
bring an Idol to a place like this?

13995.「<pc>さんは この ご神像を焚いて\n みんなを 助けるつもりなんでしょう？:
<pc> is going to help everyone by
burning this Idol, isn't he?<yesno><close>

13996.「わかりました！！\n この 香術師カランも ハラをくくります！\n すぐに お:
I understand! This perfumer Karan, too, will
have a hara! Now let's make some incense!

13997.「よし……。\n 後は このかけらに 火をつければ……。:
All right... all that's left is to light this
piece...

13998.「やった…… 見てください！\n アルノー君のアザが 消えました！\n 死神の息:
We did it... Look! Arnoud's birthmark is gone!
The Reaper's Breath has cured him!

14001.「こ これは………。\n まさか この木片は…… ご神像では！？:
This... no way, this piece of wood... could be
an Idol!

14005.「<pc>のしたことは 過ちでしょうか！\n 神は……エルドナ神は 人々を救えと:
Was it a mistake what <pc> did! Did
not God...God Eldona...tell you to save the
people!

14007.「あなたには 失望しましたよ ヘルガ。\n 我が子の命が かかったら\n 簡単に:
I am disappointed in you, Helga. You would so
easily give up your faith if your child's life
depended on it.

14008.「確かに 神像は かけがえのない宝です。\n しかし…… 人の命は それ以上に\:
It is true that Idols are irreplaceable
treasures. But... isn't human life an even
more precious treasure?

14009.「このままでは 死神の息吹は\n 世界中に広がるでしょう。どれだけの人を\n 見:
At this rate, the Reaper's breath will spread
throughout the world. How many people do you
intend to let die?

14012.「そ…それに 洗礼の儀で エルドナ神が \n <pc>のチカラを 必要としていた:
And isn't this what God Eldona's Baptism
required the power of <pc> to do!

14013.「確かに 我々に できなかった決断を\n <pc>は やってのけました。\n エ:
Certainly, <pc> made a decision that
we could not have made. Eldona said that God
needed it...

14014.「<pc> 非礼を お許しください。\n あなたは 正しかった。\n ともに 病:
<pc> Forgive my rudeness. You were
right. Let's save the sick together.

14015.「すごいよ 治ったっ！\n 目が 見える…… 足だって動く！:
Oh, my God, he's cured! I can see... and I can
move my legs!

14016.「……これで いいのでしょう。\n 私たちは 形ばかりに 囚われ\n まことの神:
I guess that's all right. We have been so
caught up in formality that we have forgotten
the true teachings of God.

14021.「この けがれの渦は………\n 死神の息吹が まことの姿を 現したのか？:
This Epidemex, this breath of the Reaper, is
it the true form of the Reaper?

14023.「これは 神像の かけら……！\n エルドナ神が <pc>を\n 救ってくださっ:
This is a piece of Idol! Eldona has saved
<pc>!

14025.<pc>を包む 不思議な光が\n<%sEV_FEE_ITEM_A>に 変わった！:
The mysterious light surrounding <pc>
has turned into <%sEV_FEE_ITEM_A>!

14026.「なんと 神々しい……。\n <pc> あなたは 奇跡の人です。:
How divine... <pc> you are a miracle
worker.

14027.「お前が いなければ\n アルノーは どうなっていたことか……。\n 礼を言わせ:
I don't know what Arnaud would have done
without you and I thank you <pc>.

14028.「……だが 安心しているヒマはない。\n けがれの渦は いずこかへ\n 飛び去っ:
But there was no time for reassurance. The
Epidemex has flown away.

14029.「このまま あの渦を 野放しにしていては\n 死神の息吹が ふたたび 世に現れる:
If we continue to let that vortex run wild,
the Reaper's breath will once again appear in
the world.

14030.「あの渦は 私たちが 必ず見つけだす……。\n お前は いずれ訪れる 決戦の時ま:
We will surely find that vortex, so I want you
to build up your strength for the decisive
battle that will eventually come.

24400.「おやおや。\n いったい なんの さわぎですか？: Well, well, well. What's that noise?

24402.「大僧正！ 残る病人たちを 助けましょう！\n 人々を救うことこそが ボクたちの:
High Priest! Let's help the sick who remain!
It is our duty to save the people!

32316.「ボク とっても 怖かった……。\n 身体が まっくらやみに 吸い込まれて\n:
I was so scared... my body was sucked into the
pitch dark... and it was so quiet and cold. I
was...

32317.「おまけに 怖い声が ボクに ささやくんだ。\n 誰も 助けてくれないよ……って:
In addition, a scary voice whispered to me.
"No one will help me...

32318.<if_woman>「でも そんなこと なかったよ。\n <pc>ねえちゃんが:
<if_woman>But it wasn't like that. Sister <pc>
you came. Thank you so much for your help.<else>But it wasn't like that. Brother <pc>
you came. Thank you so much for your help.<endif>
